metadata.title: CVE-2019-3821 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the way civetweb frontend was handling requests forceph RGW server with SSL enabled. An unauthenticated attacker could createmultiple connections to ceph RADOS gateway to exhaust file descriptors forceph-radosgw service resulting in a remote denial of service.

criterions.comment: ceph: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
